name: Take a Shit CZ,EN
description:
Take a Shit! / Naser si! (EN and CZ version available)

You sit on the toilet and push out something really big. After you are done, you reach for toilet paper but what's that? There is not enough paper for covering such a massive work and whatever is left is completely overwritten by some game! What do you do now?

This game is a digital version of our toilet gamebook we created at Game Jam Prague 2015.

Screenplay: Ondřej Sýkora, Emil Gašparec, Jaroslav Meloun

Programming: Emil Gašparec

Graphics: Ondřej Sýkora

English localization: Jan Fryštenský

(Uploaded for Archiving Purposes)
